timelineEvents.title: Company Founded
timelineEvents.description: Initial company incorporation and team formation with founding members.

timelineEvents.title: Seed Funding
timelineEvents.description: Raised $500K in seed funding from angel investors to kickstart operations.

timelineEvents.title: First Product
timelineEvents.description: Launched MVP with core features and onboarded first 100 beta users.

timelineEvents.title: Series A
timelineEvents.description: Closed $2M Series A funding round led by venture capital firm.

timelineEvents.title: Team Expansion
timelineEvents.description: Grew team to 25 employees across engineering, sales, and marketing.

timelineEvents.title: Product V2
timelineEvents.description: Major product overhaul with new UI/UX and advanced analytics features.

timelineEvents.title: Enterprise Launch
timelineEvents.description: Launched enterprise tier with advanced security and compliance features.

timelineEvents.title: Project Launch
timelineEvents.description: Initial setup and project launch with stakeholders onboard.

timelineEvents.title: International Expansion
timelineEvents.description: Opened offices in London and Tokyo, serving global customer base.

timelineEvents.title: Mobile App
timelineEvents.description: Released iOS and Android mobile applications with offline sync.

timelineEvents.title: AI Integration
timelineEvents.description: Integrated machine learning capabilities for predictive analytics.

timelineEvents.title: Remote Pivot
timelineEvents.description: Successfully transitioned to fully remote operations during pandemic.

timelineEvents.title: Mid-phase Review
timelineEvents.description: Review of progress and adjusting milestones accordingly.

timelineEvents.title: Series B
timelineEvents.description: Raised $15M Series B to accelerate growth and R&D investments.

timelineEvents.title: Platform API
timelineEvents.description: Released comprehensive API platform for third-party integrations.

timelineEvents.title: User Feedback
timelineEvents.description: Gathered feedback from early users to improve features.

timelineEvents.title: Acquisition
timelineEvents.description: Acquired competitor startup to expand market share and talent pool.

timelineEvents.title: IPO Preparation
timelineEvents.description: Began preparations for initial public offering with investment banks.

timelineEvents.title: Global Milestone
timelineEvents.description: Reached 1 million active users across 50 countries worldwide.

timelineEvents.title: Public Launch
timelineEvents.description: Successful IPO launch on NASDAQ with strong market reception.

timelineEvents.title: Final Testing
timelineEvents.description: The final round of testing before public release.

timelineEvents.title: Next Gen Platform
timelineEvents.description: Launched next-generation platform with AI-powered automation.

timelineEvents.title: Sustainability Initiative
timelineEvents.description: Launched carbon-neutral operations and green technology program.

timelineEvents.title: Innovation Lab
timelineEvents.description: Opened dedicated R&D innovation lab for emerging technologies.
